oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Palestine ancienne & moderne d'après les sources les plus authentiques
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Andriveau-Goujon, E. (Eugène) , 1832-1897
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: par E. Andriveau ; gravé le trait et les montagnes par Gérin, les écritures par P. Rousset, les eaux par Mme Fontaine.
Covers portions of Israel, Jordan, Syria and Lebanon.
Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by sounding and isolines.

Insets: [Sinai] (Scale [ca. 1:2,600,000]) -- Golfe de Suez -- [Cross section of the Palestine from the source of the Jordan to the Red Sea] -- [Panoramic view of the mountains of Palestine] -- Jérusalem d'après le plan de G. Williams (Scale [ca. 1:80,000]).
In French with place names in Latin, Arabic and Hebrew in Latin script.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale 1:600,000(E 33⁰59ʹ31ʺ--E 37⁰04ʹ41ʺ/N 34⁰23ʹ34ʺ--N 30⁰25ʹ57ʺ).
Palestine
Lebanon
